name: Girls in STEM Conference
description: A conference dedicated to inspiring and empowering girls to pursue careers in STEM with workshops, panels, and networking opportunities.

name: STEM Girls' Innovation Camp
description: A virtual camp allowing girls to explore various fields of STEM through interactive projects and mentorship from industry leaders.

name: Tech Girls Summit
description: A summit aimed at encouraging young women to explore technology careers with hands-on workshops, inspiring talks, and networking events.

name: Women in Engineering Day
description: Celebrate and empower girls in engineering with events and activities led by leading women engineers.

name: Code Like A Girl Workshop
description: A one-day workshop focused on teaching girls foundational skills in coding and programming.

name: AI4Good Summit
description: A global summit discussing the impact of AI on social good.

name: Women in AI Conference
description: An inspiring conference focused on the contributions of women in the field of AI.

name: AI Expo North America
description: A major AI conference showcasing the latest advancements and innovations.

name: International Conference on Machine Learning and Big Data
description: Explore the latest research in AI, machine learning, and big data.

name: Girls in AI Hackathon 2025
description: A 48-hour hackathon where girls from around the world collaborate to create AI solutions for social good.

name: AI Scholars Program - Winter 2025
description: A prestigious bootcamp designed for high school girls interested in AI, offering workshops and mentorship from leading experts.

name: Women in AI & Machine Learning Conference 2025
description: A conference focusing on the latest advancements in AI and Machine Learning, with sessions led by women in the industry.

name: Teen Girls AI Design Challenge
description: A competition encouraging teenage girls to develop innovative AI-powered projects and solutions.

name: International Day of Women and Girls in Science AI Summit 2026
description: A summit celebrating women and girls in science with a focus on AI-related achievements and workshops.

name: Girls in Robotics: Innovate and Build Challenge
description: A virtual competition designed for girls aged 12-18 to explore robotics through innovative projects.

name: RoboGals Coding & Robotics Bootcamp
description: An immersive bootcamp for girls to learn robotics coding, design, and teamwork with hands-on sessions.

name: Women in Robotics Hackathon
description: Join women from around the world to tackle robotics-related challenges and learn from industry leaders.

name: FIRST Tech Challenge - Girls in STEM League
description: A specialized league within the FIRST Tech Challenge focused on encouraging girls in STEM through robotics competitions.
